com.slightlyloony.blog.templates.sources

Interface Source

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Datum
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DateSource, HomePageRootSource, RequestSource, RootSource, SourceBase, UserSource, VariableSource

    public interface Source
extends Datum
    Implemented by template data sources. A template data source is conceptually a container of named datum items, each of which is an arbitrary object whose toString() method will produce a string that may be used to substitute for a variable in a template, or another source.
    Author:
    Tom Dilatush tom@dilatush.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Datum get(int _index)
      Returns the datum at the given index, or null if the index is out of range, or if the datum has no value.
      DatumDefs getDefs()
      Returns this source's datum definitions.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.slightlyloony.blog.templates.sources.data.Datum

        getValue

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Datum get(int _index)
        Returns the datum at the given index, or null if the index is out of range, or if the datum has no value.
        Parameters:
        _index - the name of the datum to retrieve
        Returns:
        the value of the datum, or null if the index is out of range, or if the datum has no value
